scenes.description: Performance of the song '幾億光年' (Ikuokukounen).
Transition and applause following the performance.
Performance of the song 'さよならまたいつか!' (Sayonara Mata Itsuka!).
Transition and applause following the performance.

subtitles.original: いつまでも心で想い続けてる まだ僕の声は聞こえてる？
subtitles.english: I'll keep thinking of you in my heart forever, can you still hear my voice?

subtitles.original: 包み出し日々 目を開けるたび
subtitles.english: In the days that unfold, every time I open my eyes,

subtitles.original: 近づいていく 運命と真実へ
subtitles.english: I'm drawing closer to destiny and truth.

subtitles.original: 言えなかった 胸の奥の言葉
subtitles.english: The words deep in my heart that I couldn't say,

subtitles.original: 今ならありのまま君に渡せる
subtitles.english: I can give them to you just as they are now.

subtitles.original: どれだけの時が流れても
subtitles.english: No matter how much time passes,

subtitles.original: 永遠に過去形にならない I love you
subtitles.english: My 'I love you' will never be in the past tense.

subtitles.original: さよーならまたいつか！
subtitles.english: Goodbye, until we meet again someday!

subtitles.original: どこから春が巡り来るのか
subtitles.english: From where does the spring come around?

subtitles.original: 知らず知らず大人になった
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I had become an adult.

subtitles.original: 見上げた先にツバメが飛んでいた けのなき顔で
subtitles.english: Looking up, a swallow was flying with an indifferent face.

subtitles.original: もしも私に翼があれば
subtitles.english: If I had wings,

subtitles.original: 長い旅に悲しみ暮らと
subtitles.english: I'd spend a long journey in sadness.

subtitles.original: さよなら100年先でまた会いましょう
subtitles.english: Goodbye, let's meet again in a hundred years.

subtitles.original: 心配しないで
subtitles.english: Don't you worry.

subtitles.original: いつの間にか花が落ちた
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, the flowers had fallen.

subtitles.original: 誰かが私に嘘をついた
subtitles.english: Someone told me a lie.

subtitles.original: 土砂降りでも構わず飛んでいく
subtitles.english: Flying off regardless of the downpour,

subtitles.original: その力が欲しかった
subtitles.english: I wanted that kind of strength.

subtitles.original: 誰かと恋に落ちて また砕けて
subtitles.english: Falling in love with someone, then breaking again,

subtitles.original: やがて離れ離れ
subtitles.english: And eventually drifting apart.

subtitles.original: 口の中は血が滲んで
subtitles.english: With blood seeping in my mouth,

subtitles.original: 空に唾を吐く
subtitles.english: I spit at the sky.

subtitles.original: 瞬け羽を広げ
subtitles.english: Twinkle and spread your wings,

subtitles.original: 気ままに飛べ
subtitles.english: Fly as you please,

subtitles.original: どこまでも行け
subtitles.english: Go as far as you can.

subtitles.original: 100年先も覚えてるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll remember in a hundred years.

subtitles.original: 知らねえけれど さよならまたいつか
subtitles.english: I don't know, but goodbye until we meet again.

subtitles.original: しぐるるやしぐるる街あゆみ入る
subtitles.english: Walking into the drizzling, drizzling town,

subtitles.original: そこかしこで袖触れる
subtitles.english: Brushing sleeves here and there.

subtitles.original: 見えてた先に何もいなかった
subtitles.english: There was nothing at the destination I saw,

subtitles.original: ああ いなかった
subtitles.english: Oh, there was nothing.

subtitles.original: したり顔で触らないで
subtitles.english: Don't touch me with that smug look,

subtitles.original: 背中を殴りつける窓外れ
subtitles.english: Hitting my back, missing the window.

subtitles.original: 人ゴミの友 地獄の先にこそ
subtitles.english: Friend in the crowd, it's beyond the hell

subtitles.original: 私は春を見る
subtitles.english: That I see the spring.

subtitles.original: 誰かを愛したくて でも痛くて
subtitles.english: Wanting to love someone, but it hurts,

subtitles.original: いつしか雨上がれ
subtitles.english: May the rain stop someday.

subtitles.original: 繋がっていた縄を握りしめて
subtitles.english: Clutching the rope that held us together,

subtitles.original: 死ぬかと道ちぎる
subtitles.english: I tear through the path as if I might die.

subtitles.original: 貫け狙い定め
subtitles.english: Pierce through, take your aim,

subtitles.original: 蹴散らし捕らえ
subtitles.english: Scatter them and capture,

subtitles.original: どこまでも行け
subtitles.english: Go as far as you can.

subtitles.original: 100年先のあなたに会いたい
subtitles.english: I want to see you in a hundred years.

subtitles.original: 消え失せるなよ さよならまたいつか
subtitles.english: Don't you fade away, goodbye until we meet again.

subtitles.original: 今 恋に落ちて また砕けて
subtitles.english: Now falling in love, then breaking again,

subtitles.original: 離れ離れ
subtitles.english: Drifting apart.

subtitles.original: 口の中は血が滲んで
subtitles.english: With blood seeping in my mouth,

subtitles.original: 空に唾を吐く
subtitles.english: I spit at the sky.

subtitles.original: 今 羽を広げ
subtitles.english: Now spread your wings,

subtitles.original: 気ままに飛べ
subtitles.english: Fly as you please,

subtitles.original: どこまでも行け
subtitles.english: Go as far as you can.

subtitles.original: 生まれた日から私知ってたんだ
subtitles.english: I've known it since the day I was born.

subtitles.original: 知らなかっただろ さよならまたいつか
subtitles.english: You didn't know, did you? Goodbye until we meet again.

subtitles.original: 晩餐歌
subtitles.english: Bansanka

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから だから一緒にはいれないな
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry, that's why we can't be together.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから 早く忘れてほしいんだ
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry, I want you to forget me soon.

subtitles.original: 人間だからね たまには違うものも食べたいね
subtitles.english: We're only human, so sometimes we want to eat something different.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから そう君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry, yes, because I'll make you cry.

subtitles.original: でも 味気ないないないだよね 会いたい会いたくないんだよね
subtitles.english: But it's so bland, isn't it? You want to see me, yet you don't.

subtitles.original: 君が会いたい会いたくないんだよね なんて勝手だね
subtitles.english: You want to see me, yet you don't. How selfish of you.
